actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Byron and Helen Anderson, Kenneth C. and Lois Mahan, James W. and Mary Irene Riley, James and Mary Waggoner, Ellis and Myrtle Waggoner, Delman and Donna Ford, and Otto and Agnes Kraasch.

summary.text: Confers jurisdiction upon the United States Tax Court and the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit to rehear, determine, and render judgment with respect to certain tax cases.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Byron and Helen Anderson, Kenneth C. and Lois Mahan, James W. and Mary Irene Riley, James and Mary Waggoner, Ellis and Myrtle Waggoner, Delman and Donna Ford, and Otto and Agnes Kraasch.
